name: Miðgarður Restaurant
description: A modern Nordic restaurant that celebrates Icelandic cuisine with fresh, local ingredients. Our chefs create innovative dishes that honor traditional flavors while bringing a contemporary twist to every plate.
menu:
Starters: Smoked Arctic Char, Icelandic Lamb Soup, Beetroot Salad
Main Courses: Grilled Lamb Fillet, Pan-Seared Arctic Char, Vegetable Wellington
Desserts: Skyr Mousse, Rhubarb Crumble, Chocolate Lava Cake
